subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wright, wearing his Mets helmet while playing in a game for the first time since April 14, went 1 for 3 with a walk as the designated hitter for Class A St. Lucie.
snippet: Wright, wearing his Mets helmet while playing in a game for the first time since April 14, went 1 for 3 with a walk as the designated hitter for Class A St. Lucie.
